title: Add worker attribution and tab organization to admin panel

requirements.text: Store the worker identity (name and ID) with each material submission so the system can track which worker uploaded which material

quotes: if someone will upload material and another one want to buy, he will contact the website owner, but website owner don't know who uploaded the material

acceptanceCriteria: Material submissions include worker name and ID fields
Worker information is persisted with the material data
Backend stores the association between materials and workers

requirements.text: Store the worker identity (name and ID) with each service/worker profile submission so the system can track attribution

quotes: show, which material or service posted by which worker

acceptanceCriteria: Worker profile submissions include submitter identification
Attribution data is stored with each service listing
Backend maintains the link between workers and their postings

requirements.text: Display worker attribution information (name and ID) for each material in the admin panel so the website owner knows who uploaded it

quotes: show, which material or service posted by which worker
website owner don't know who uploaded the material

acceptanceCriteria: Admin panel displays worker name for each material entry
Worker ID is visible in the material details
Attribution information is clearly labeled and easy to identify

requirements.text: Display worker attribution information (name and ID) for each service posting in the admin panel

quotes: show, which material or service posted by which worker

acceptanceCriteria: Admin panel shows who posted each service/worker profile
Worker attribution is displayed alongside service data
Information is formatted consistently with material attribution

requirements.text: Organize admin panel data into separate tabs: one for materials, one for services/workers, and one for general contact messages

quotes: all data in saperate tabs in admin

acceptanceCriteria: Admin panel uses a tabbed interface with at least three tabs
Materials tab shows all material submissions with worker attribution
Services tab shows all worker/service postings with attribution
Messages tab shows contact form submissions and other messages
User can switch between tabs without losing data

constraints: Do not change the existing admin authentication mechanism (username/password: Bharat1213)
Maintain backward compatibility with existing stored materials and workers data
Preserve the current message storage format in the backend
nonGoals: Implementing direct buyer-seller communication within the platform
Adding payment or transaction processing features
Creating separate admin accounts for different roles
